response.overview: Oh My Ghost is a comedy genre Marathi film in which an orphan young man Jaggu who considered himself loser and failure ,suddenly starts seeing deads.He believes himself to be unfortunate and after all these, his life become more chaotic.
response.tagline: Oh My Ghost is a comedy genre Marathi film in which an orphan young man Jaggu who considered himself loser and failure
response.title: Oh My Ghost
